For details see accompanying license terms. */

/** * DragTracker implements interactions with the content area of a * Figure. *

* The DragTracker handles one of the three states of the * SelectionTool. It comes into action, when the user presses * the mouse button over the content area of a Figure. * * @see SelectionTool * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 2.0.1 2007-11-05 Fixed a null pointer exception in method * mousePressed which occured, when the user deselected the selected * figure using shift-click. *
2.0 2006-01-14 Changed to support double precision coordinates. *
1.0 2003-12-01 Derived from JHotDraw 5.4b1. */
